recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich, savory sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Boil the pasta. 2. Cook the ground beef with onion and garlic. 3. Add tomato sauce. 4. Combine with pasta.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful and aromatic curry dish.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion and garlic. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Stir in curry paste and coconut milk. 4. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A creamy beef dish served with noodles.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook beef and onions. 2. Add mushrooms and cook until tender. 3. Stir in sour cream. 4. Serve over egg noodles.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A fresh and tangy salad with feta cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Mix with feta and olives. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Sushi
recipes.description: A Japanese dish of vinegared rice and various toppings or fillings.
recipes.steps: 1. Prepare sushi rice. 2. Lay nori on a mat and spread rice. 3. Add fillings and roll tightly. 4. Slice and serve.

recipes.title: Tacos
recipes.description: A Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with various toppings.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook ground beef with seasoning. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish with layers of pasta, meat, cheese, and sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook noodles. 2. Prepare meat sauce with ground beef and tomato sauce. 3. Layer noodles, sauce, and cheese. 4. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Paella
recipes.description: A traditional Spanish rice dish with seafood and vegetables.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté seafood and vegetables. 2. Add rice and saffron. 3. Add water and simmer until rice is cooked.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: A Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion and bell pepper. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Create wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them. 4. Cover and cook until eggs are poached.

recipes.title: Moussaka
recipes.description: A Greek casserole with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Fry eggplant slices. 2. Cook ground lamb with tomato sauce. 3. Layer eggplant, lamb, and béchamel sauce. 4. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Banh Mi
recipes.description: A Vietnamese sandwich with a crispy baguette and various fillings.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook pork and slice. 2. Slice baguette and spread mayonnaise. 3. Fill with pork, pickled vegetables, and cilantro.

recipes.title: Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy Italian rice dish, often cooked with broth and cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion in butter. 2. Add rice and cook until translucent. 3. Gradually add broth, stirring until absorbed. 4. Stir in parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.description: An Italian dish consisting of a yeasted flatbread topped with tomato sauce and cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Make dough and let rise. 2. Roll out dough and top with sauce, cheese, and toppings. 3. Bake until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: A Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion and bell pepper. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Create wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them. 4. Cover and cook until eggs are poached.

recipes.title: Moussaka
recipes.description: A Greek casserole with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Fry eggplant slices. 2. Cook ground lamb with tomato sauce. 3. Layer eggplant, lamb, and béchamel sauce. 4. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy Italian rice dish, often cooked with broth and cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion in butter. 2. Add rice and cook until translucent. 3. Gradually add broth, stirring until absorbed. 4. Stir in parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: A Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté onion and bell pepper. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Create wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them. 4. Cover and cook until eggs are poached.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
recipes.description: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté vegetables. 2. Layer in a baking dish. 3. Bake until tender.

recipes.title: Goulash
recipes.description: A Hungarian stew of meat and vegetables, seasoned with paprika.
recipes.steps: 1. Sauté beef and onions. 2. Add paprika and vegetables. 3. Simmer until tender.

recipes.title: Churros
recipes.description: A fried-dough pastry, typically sprinkled with sugar.
recipes.steps: 1. Make dough. 2. Pipe and fry dough. 3. Roll in sugar and cinnamon.

recipes.title: Poutine
recipes.description: A Canadian dish consisting of fries topped with cheese curds and gravy.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook fries. 2. Prepare gravy. 3. Assemble with cheese curds and gravy.

recipes.title: Croissant
recipes.description: A buttery, flaky, and layered French pastry.
recipes.steps: 1. Make dough. 2. Layer with butter and fold. 3. Shape and bake.

recipes.title: Biryani
recipes.description: A mixed rice dish with its origins among the Muslims of the Indian subcontinent.
recipes.steps: 1. Marinate chicken. 2. Cook rice with spices. 3. Layer rice and chicken. 4. Cook until done.

recipes.title: Clam Chowder
recipes.description: A rich and creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, and onions.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook bacon and onions. 2. Add potatoes and clams. 3. Stir in cream and simmer.

recipes.title: Fajitas
recipes.description: A Tex-Mex dish consisting of grilled meat served on a tortilla.
recipes.steps: 1. Marinate and grill chicken. 2. Sauté peppers and onions. 3. Serve with tortillas.

recipes.title: Shepherd's Pie
recipes.description: A comforting dish with a meat and vegetable filling topped with mashed potatoes.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook ground lamb with vegetables. 2. Spread in a baking dish and top with mashed potatoes. 3. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: A luxurious dish of beef tenderloin wrapped in puff pastry.
recipes.steps: 1. Sear beef and cool. 2. Wrap in mushrooms and prosciutto. 3. Encase in puff pastry and bake.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: A creamy pasta dish with chicken and Alfredo sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Sauté chicken and garlic. 3. Add cream and cheese. 4. Toss with pasta.
